name: OVERGROW
description:
OVERGROW is a Retro Zombie FPS developed in Unreal Engine 4.🧟

Through the eyes of a special forces soldier, the game tells the story of an apocalyptic plague spreading throughout the city. The city is now in quarantine and nobody can escape from this terror. The army has been destroyed by the plague, you are one of the last soldiers fighting this war. Fight for your life through the streets, move in the darkness, kill hordes of ferocious zombies in this nostalgic horror experience.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

The game features:

  • 3D retro psx style graphics
  • An adrenalinic soundtrack for a terrifying play experience
  • An environment based in an overgrown city submerged in fog
  • 2 game modes: Silent City and Arcade Mode
  • Gameplay full of horror, gore and death
  • Hordes of zombies for terrifying and breathless fun
  • Powerful weapons to assist in the enjoyment of the zombie destruction
  • Dynamic Day/Night system
  • 100% DRM free

    • - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

    A game developed by PsygonWave Interactive
